name: Click Crusaders
description:
The ritual has failed. The undead hordes are coming... can you click your way to salvation?

I ran out of time to get tooltips working, so here's a writeup on all the items/units and a bit of lore if you're into that.

Lore, Units and Items

It has been 50 years since the King has died. Believing him divine, the crown was passed on to the Church after his death. Plagues, famine, and natural disasters have ravaged the once prosperous nation, leading to growing dissention among the people.

On the 48th anniversary of his death, a tremendous quake rocked the capitol during the annual ceremony, a monument falling and killing the three reigning High Priests. That evening, a violet comet streaked across the night sky.

Convinced this was a divine message, the King outraged at the Church's failings, they worked feverishly to study the once outlawed practice of blood magic. Untold horrors and atrocities were committed throughout the capitol and beyond in the name of resurrecting the King.  Blood spattered violet capes fluttered through the streets in search of the next sacrifice.

On the brink of civil war, the city in flames, the priests locked themselves in the Grand Temple of the Capitol and performed a massive blood ritual. The ritual failed to resurrect the king but was strong enough to open a swirling rift to the unknown. The Grand Temple crumbled in on itself, leaving only a shimmering hole in the ground.

A skeletal hand reaches out and pulls itself out of the hole. The undead hordes are coming. You may not be the good guys, but you are humanity's last hope.

  Holy Candles

Thought to protect the faithful from evil by drawing the eyes of the King to their household.

Provides 1 Divine Power per second.

  Worshipper

Despite the rebellious whispers of the general populace regarding the Church's reckless dabbling in forces they don't understand, there are still endless ranks of faithful believers who pray to the King for salvation.

Provides 7 Divine Power per second.

  Temple

Magnificent temples and centers of worships to the dead King speck the vast expanse of the Kingdom, the greatest of which was destroyed in the incident that opened the gate to the Undead.

Provides 40 Divine Power per second

  Zealot

Unflinching believers in the faith, they had their own eyes plucked from their skulls to further heighten their ability to sense the King's divine will. Unlike most, they have embraced the Church's experimentation with the newly discovered blood magics.

Provides 70 Divine Power per second

  Templar

The backbone of the church during crusades and wars with neighboring kingdoms. Wears the royal purple cloak favored by the King during his reign.

Provides 1 Damage per second

 Priest

Ordained priests of the church, inadvertently opened the gate to the undead during a failed attempt to resurrect their beloved king with blood magic. Though reviled by the world around, can perform healing rituals in exchange for a sacrifice.

Provides 1 Healing per second

 Apostle

Only the most studied and devoted followers of the church achieve rank of apostle. Wearing the crimson robes of the new faith, they hold a small amount of divine ability granted by the dead King, allowing them to smite their enemies.

Provides 7 Damage per second

 Paladin

Donning the coveted scarlet cloak, Paladins are the most battle hardened and loyal warriors of the faith's ranks, earning their cloaks after committing untold horrors in the quest to resurrect their dead King.

Provides 30 Damage per second

 Cursor Multiplier

Each click earns x2 Divine Power / does 2x Damage.

Can be upgraded (x2, x4, x8)

 Cursor Attack

Each click on the cross or an enemy will automatically attack one enemy.

Can be upgraded (x1 enemy, x2 enemies, x3 enemies)

Note: I added an easy mode in case someone enjoys the game but finds it too difficult. I did not have time to balance test it, I just adjusted a lot of the enemy scaling. Hope someone finds it fun!

Credits: All assets, design, and programming by me. Made using Godot.
